data.title: Configure default pricing rules API Trace
data.bodyText:
{
  "stepKey": "owner-configure-pricing",

        "name": "Primary Asset",
        "slug": "asset-w9yde8yt",
        "capacity": 1,
        "bufferBeforeMinutes": 5,

          "name": "Primary Asset",
          "slug": "asset-w9yde8yt",
          "description": null,
          "timezone": "UTC",
          "statusDefinitionId": null,
          "hostUserId": null,
          "groupAccountId": null,
          "assetId": null,
          "venueId": null,
          "capacity": 1,
          "allowSimultaneousBookings": false,
          "maxSimultaneousBookings": null,
          "bufferBeforeMinutes": 5,
          "bufferAfterMinutes": 5,
          "metadata": {},
          "createdAt": "2026-02-24T15:44:15.287Z",

data.instruction: Create at least one host resource and one non-host resource (asset or venue) suitable for the UC.
data.expectedResult: Resources are created with expected type, location, and buffers.
